titleStmt.title: Some short observations made on a book newly published by Mr. Benjamin Keach intituled, The breach repaired in God's worship, &c. wherein is contained a pretended answer to Isaac Marlow's Brief discourse concerning singing in the publick worship of God; as also to an appendix, lately published, and thereunto added.
titleStmt.author: Marlow, Isaac.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: By Isaac Marlow.
In response to Keach, Benjamin. The breach repaired in God's worship.
Copy cropped at head, affecting text.
Reproduction of the original in the Lincoln's Inn Library, London.
